name: LabBat
description:
Welcome, Recruit, to the BARTF (Bat Army Recruitment & Testing Facility). We've graciously gifted you the ability of flight so you can complete our training course and get on the field ASAP! Do you have what it takes?

----------Controls----------

WASD - Move

Space - Jump(Hold to glide)

Shift - Walk On Ceiling

E - Grab Items (Toggle)

The Team

Foley: Gimli10003

Illustrator: Tarrott

Composer: BizzareMagician

Project Lead/Level Designer: Deditch

Lead  Programmer: VroWhat
